channel.title: Go Humble! RSS BOOKS
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle books bundles!

item.title: 5th Edition Adventures, Crafting, Monsters and VTT Assets
item.content:encoded: Gather up your party for new takes on classic adventures within the Dungeons & Dragons universe—this action-packed bundle supports one of the most iconic games ever! Our 5th Edition-centric TTRPG explorer’s kit contains rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources like Endless Encounters: Dungeons, Ultimate Bestiary - The Dreaded Accursed, Deck of Dirty Tricks Vol 1., and more! Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey alongside your closest allies and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund with your purchase!

item.title: Invisible Sun RPG Mega Bundle by Monte Cook Games
item.content:encoded: Gather your friends for endless adventure with this gigantic bundle of tabletop role-playing resources for the uber-popular title Invisible Sun. Our latest mega bundle by Monte Cook Games has everything you need to run the latest and greatest version of Invisible Sun. Get rulebooks, sourcebooks, and expansion campaigns like Secrets of Silent Streets, The Nightside, Book M, and more. Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey together and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: Machine Learning Engineer Masterclass by Packt
item.description: Machine learning solutions for the future
item.content:encoded: Master machine learning with this comprehensive bundle of in-depth lessons from Packt. Inside this expertly curated library of 21 books, you'll uncover industry-leading insights from our newest resources like LLM Engineer's Handbook, Python Machine Learning By Example, The Machine Learning Solutions Architect Handbook, and many more! Whether you're starting your journey or advancing your expertise, this bundle offers everything you need to excel in areas like natural language processing, neural networks, and real-world ML applications. Transform your understanding of machine learning and help support Direct Relief, providing life-saving medical aid across the globe, with your purchase!

item.title: Marvel Universe Novels
item.content:encoded:
Experience the adventures of marquee Marvel Comic characters like The Hulk, Iron Man, and more with The Ultimate Marvel Bundle. This 10+ book collection features some of the most famous crossover events and storylines in Marvel history like Marvel Super Heroes: Secret Wars, Iron Man: Extremis, Planet Hulk, and more. Can Tony Stark stop the Extremis plague from destroying the world? How will The Hulk react to being banished from Earth? Find out in this bundle of iconic books. Lose yourself in this expansive library, and help support the Hero Initiative with your purchase!

Character names and likenesses above © Marvel.

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.

item.title: Piano and More for Dummies by Wiley
item.content:encoded: Hit all the right keys with our latest music bundle from Wiley! Get ebooks to teach you piano and other general musical skills like Piano & Keyboard All-in-One For Dummies, Music Composition For Dummies, Songwriting For Dummies, and Piano Exercises For Dummies. The experts behind the For Dummies series have been helping with reading and learning a variety of skills for more than 30 years, and their lessons will have you creating original music with ease. Plus, your purchase directly helps support Music Will— a nonprofit supporting future generations of musicians.

item.title: Cybersecurity and Forensics by Packt
item.content:encoded: Learn the skills and knowledge you need to succeed in defending your networks, websites, and more with this bundle of in-depth cybersecurity lessons from Packt. Inside this 15+ course library, you’ll get expert insights from industry-leading courses including Cyber Warfare - Truth, Tactics, and Strategies, Practical Cybersecurity Architecture, iOS Forensics for Investigators, and more! Deepen your understanding of the detection and prevention of cyber attacks, whether you’re a novice or a seasoned professional, and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!

item.title: Spies vs Vampires: The complete Night's Black Agents & Dracula Dossier Bundle
item.description: Burned spies face the horrors of the night
item.content:encoded: Powered by the GUMSHOE system, the Night’s Black Agents RPG lets you play hyper-competent spies fighting a conspiracy led by vampires. This bundle features rules, adventures and expansions for the Night’s Black Agents RPG, including the epic Dracula Dossier campaign. In this campaign, you must track down and face the ultimate threat - Dracula himself! The Dossier offers an updated version of Stoker’s masterpiece and adds new letters and recordings, diary entries, and documents suppressed by Her Majesty’s Government, plus a Director’s Handbook filled with locations and leads to let your players hunt their greatest adversary. From Transylvania to London, the hunt is on!

item.title: Stitch & Bitch by Insight Editions
item.content:encoded: Feeling a little frustrated—do you need to work out some aggression? Then our newest bundle from Insight Editions is for you. The Stitch & Bitch Bundle is our edgiest and funniest crafts bundle ever! Get ebooks like Maybe Swearing Will Help: Relax and Curse Your Ass Off In Cross-Stitch, Festive As F*ck: Subversive Cross-Stitch For the Holidays, Crochet Amigurumi For Every Occasion: 21 Easy Projects to Celebrate Life's Happy Moments, and more! Plus, your purchase helps NatureBridge!

item.title: Unseen Struggles: Living with Anxiety, Depression, ADHD, and More
item.description: Mental health teachings from top professionals
item.content:encoded: Get ebooks from top professionals to help you manage your depression, anxiety, ADHD, and other mental diagnoses. You’re not alone—and this bundle is designed to help you feel seen and to show that we all struggle inside sometimes. Learn new techniques from titles like Why Smart People Hurt, Hack Your Anxiety, Depression Hates a Moving Target, Mini ADHD Coach, and more. Manage your unseen struggles and help support Active Minds with your purchase.

item.title: Manara, Moebius, and the Metabaron by Humanoids
item.description: Fresh comics with fiercely independent styles
item.content:encoded: Lose yourself in an awesome comics collection featuring Metal Hurlant: Selected Works, The Incal Vol. 1-6, The Metabaron Vol. 1-6, and more! Feel the power of turning the digital page on a gripping story with a warm drink on a cool winter day and get our latest comic book bundle by Humanoids Publishing today! Since their founding in the early 1970s, Humanoids Publishing has embodied creative innovation, a fiercely independent spirit, and a drive to break new ground within the medium. Get 50+ titles, and help support the Freedom to Read Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Hellboy Universe Megabundle
item.content:encoded: Lose yourself in the renowned Hellboy comic series in this Megabundle from Dark Horse Comics! Get 25+ novels, comics, and graphic novels exploring the rich, dark, hilarious and action-packed world of the demonic superhero, Hellboy. This Megabundle features red hot Hellboy titles like Hellboy and the B.P.R.D: 1952-1956, Mike Mignola's Hellboy 2023, Abe Sapien Volume 1: The Drowning, and more! Explore the expansive Hellboy Universe and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!
